short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that informs you when new search results are displayed on sites such as WG-Gesucht and ImmobilienScout24.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of manually refreshing sites like ImmoScout24 and WG-Gesucht constantly?This is a Chrome extension that helps you stay up-to-date with the latest apartment listings. Instead of manually checking the site, the extension refreshes the page for you and notifies you when new listings that match your search criteria become available. 

By acting quickly, you can increase your chances of securing a desired apartment!
